attributes.additional_details: People who are terminally ill are suffering a cruel and inhuman way of dying that we wouldn’t let animals go through.
attributes.background: I want it made legal and a choice for terminally ill patients to have the right to euthanasia

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Legalise euthanasia:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642264
